Zend_Db

Methods

		

			Description |
																		Constants (details)
							
										Methods (details)
						
		

		

			



	
	

		
		static factory (line 157)
	
 
	
	

Factory for Zend_Db_Adapter_Abstract classes.


Additional keys are processed as key-value pairs for the adapter config array.

	
    
				
  • access: public
    • 
				
  • throws: Zend_Db_Exception
    • 
			

	
	

		static Zend_Db_Adapter_Abstract
		
			factory
		
					(string $adapterName, [array $config = array()])
			

	
			
    
					
  • 
				string
				$adapterName: Name of the adapter to return:                               'pdo_mysql' -> Zend_Db_Adapter_Pdo_Mysql			
    • 
					
  • 
				array
				$config: OPTIONAL; an array of adapter configuration keys.			
    •
